an8.84:4.1: “Mendicants, a master thief with eight factors is soon executed, and doesn’t have long to live.
an8.84:4.3: He attacks unprovoked. He steals everything without exception. He kills a woman. He rapes a girl. He robs a monk. He robs the royal treasury. He works close to home. He’s not skilled at hiding his booty.
an8.84:4.4: A master thief with these eight factors is soon executed, and doesn’t have long to live.
an8.84:5.1: A master thief with eight factors is not soon executed, and lives long.
an8.84:5.3: He doesn’t attack unprovoked. He doesn’t steal everything without exception. He doesn’t kill a woman. He doesn’t rape a girl. He doesn’t rob a monk. He doesn’t rob the royal treasury. He doesn’t work close to home. He’s skilled at hiding his booty.
an8.84:5.4: A master thief with these eight factors is soon executed, and doesn’t have long to live.”
